special-quality.name: Glasses
special-quality.description: You wear glasses, and can’t use contact lenses. The frame design can be whatever you want.

special-quality.name: Freckles
special-quality.description: You have freckles.

special-quality.name: Sickly
special-quality.description: You’ve got an incurable disease. However, this doesn’t adversely affect your attributes. Choose your own symptoms.

special-quality.name: Quiet
special-quality.description: You have a cool, subtle demeanor. No, there are no rules regarding how often you speak.

special-quality.name: Easygoing
special-quality.description: You take things slow and calm, at your own pace. This doesn’t affect your attributes.

special-quality.name: Neat Freak
special-quality.description: You’re obsessed with cleanliness, and can’t let the tiniest bit of dirt go unnoticed.

special-quality.name: Brown Skin
special-quality.description: Your skin is a dark brown color. It could be natural, or a tan.

special-quality.name: Albino
special-quality.description: You have no pigment.You’re not necessarily completely colorless, this could simply be a very pale complexion.

special-quality.name: Shy
special-quality.description: You’re very shy. Don’t forget to remain silent when encountering NPCs you haven’t met before.

special-quality.name: Actually A Guy
special-quality.description: You’re actually a guy (cross-dresser?). Or possibly a hermaphrodite.

special-quality.name: Overactive Imagination
special-quality.description: You frequently get caught up in your own imaginary world, or else tend to daydream a lot.

special-quality.name: Greedy
special-quality.description: You will do absolutely anything for the sake of money.

special-quality.name: Elf Ears
special-quality.description: You have long, pointed ears.

special-quality.name: Nekomimi
special-quality.description: This varies a bit depending on the setting, but you’re a catgirl, with the ears and possibly tail of a cat.

special-quality.name: Android/Gynoid
special-quality.description: You’re not human, but rather a human-looking robot. Parts of your body are very obviously artificial.

special-quality.name: Vampire
special-quality.description: You are a vampire, with long fangs. Be sure to act… vampiric.

special-quality.name: Princess
special-quality.description: You’re actually the daughter of a family of even greater standing than the master. Depending on the setting, you could even be from another country’s royal family. Whether you are in disguise or not is up to you.

special-quality.name: Angel/Devil
special-quality.description: You are a being from another world charged with judging good and evil. The design and the details of your origins are up to you.

special-quality.name: Uniform
special-quality.description: You’ve managed to make a special arrangement with your uniform.

special-quality.name: Tights
special-quality.description: In place of a skirt, you wear tights of some color. Athletic, colorful, sexy, or weird (leopard pattern, RAWR!) it’s up to you. (For the purposes of the maid uniform rules, treat these as a skirt)

special-quality.name: China Dress
special-quality.description: You wear a Chinese-style cheongsam maid uniform. (For the purposes of the rules, treat this as a one-piece maid uniform).

special-quality.name: Armor
special-quality.description: Your maid uniform is actually a stylized suit of metal armor.

special-quality.name: Bondage
special-quality.description: Your maid uniform is made of shiny rubber or leather, and generally a bit suspicious.

special-quality.name: Miniskirt
special-quality.description: Your skirt is very short, to the point where one can almost see its contents.

special-quality.name: Kappougi
special-quality.description: Instead of a Western maid uniform, you wear a Japanese-style one with a kimono and an apron over it.

special-quality.name: Symbol
special-quality.description: You have some kind of special mark on your uniform of headdress.

special-quality.name: Skull
special-quality.description: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a skull mark.

special-quality.name: Bat
special-quality.description: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a bat symbol.

special-quality.name: Cross
special-quality.description: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a cross on it.

special-quality.name: Yin-Yang
special-quality.description: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a yin-yang symbol.

special-quality.name: Star
special-quality.description: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a five- or six-pointed star mark.

special-quality.name: Card Suit
special-quality.description: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest is marked with one of the four suits from playing cards (heart, diamond, club, spade).

special-quality.name: Delinquent
special-quality.description: Something about you is very much like a delinquent.

special-quality.name: Cigarettes
special-quality.description: You’ve always got a cigarette in your mouth, or are chomping on a cigar.

special-quality.name: Tattoo
special-quality.description: Somewhere on your body — or maybe even all over it — you have a tattoo.

special-quality.name: Sunglasses
special-quality.description: You always wear sunglasses or mirrorshades. Even at night.

special-quality.name: Bad Expression
special-quality.description: You have a perpetual unpleasant facial expression (as if you’re always angry, or always about to kick ass at any moment), and this makes first meetings difficult.

special-quality.name: Piercings
special-quality.description: You have piercings, and not just in your ears, but perhaps your forehead, lips, eyelids, chin, etc.

special-quality.name: Rough Speak
special-quality.description: You talk like a gangster, be it a Mafioso or a street ganger.

special-quality.name: Accent
special-quality.description: You have an unusual way of speaking.

special-quality.name: Southern
special-quality.description: Y’all talk like some kinda’ country bumpkin or somethin’, from down in the American South.

special-quality.name: British
special-quality.description: You talk with a British accent of some kind. We’ll leave it up to you what kind specifically. If you are already from the UK in real life, then you are now DOUBLE BRITISH. Or choose Scottish or Welsh.

special-quality.name: Pidgin English
special-quality.description: You come from a country/society where English is taught as a pidgin language. You might sound like a Japanese salaryman or pop idol (“Body Feels Exit!”). Pick a country and go with it.

special-quality.name: Meow
special-quality.description: You like to sprinkle cat sounds in your speech every now and then.

special-quality.name: Knight
special-quality.description: You sound like a knight from a movie, or possibly a Renaissance Faire reject. Remember to say “Thou art” and whatnot a lot.

special-quality.name: Foreigner
special-quality.description: Pick a foreign nationality for your Maid other than Japanese. American (Brooklyn, Texas), French, Russian, Mexican, Nigerian, Indian, Canadian, etc.

special-quality.name: Hairstyle
special-quality.description: You have a special hairstyle.

special-quality.name: Long Ringlets
special-quality.description: Your hair is done up in large, long ringlets.

special-quality.name: Dumplings
special-quality.description: Your hair is long, with “dumplings” on top.

special-quality.name: Mesh
special-quality.description: You have a mesh haircut, a short, stylish hairdo that’s trendy in Japan.

special-quality.name: Curly Hair
special-quality.description: Your hair is curly enough to defy gravity, and always takes the same shape.

special-quality.name: One Eye Hair
special-quality.description: Your hair hangs down so that it conceals one of your eyes.

special-quality.name: Antenna Hair
special-quality.description: Your hair has antennas/feelers and a mind of its own.

special-quality.name: Accessory
special-quality.description: You have a special accessory attached to your uniform.

special-quality.name: Collar
special-quality.description: Among your standard equipment is a collar, like a dog would wear. Spikes are optional.

special-quality.name: Large Ribbon
special-quality.description: You wear a large ribbon in your hair.

special-quality.name: Spike
special-quality.description: Your maid uniform has spikes attached to it.

special-quality.name: Chains
special-quality.description: Your maid uniform has jangling chains attached to it.

special-quality.name: Black Leather Gloves
special-quality.description: You normally wear black leather gloves. These can be fingerless or have rivets if you like,

special-quality.name: Pet
special-quality.description: You have a cat, snake, raven, or some other small animal as a pet that rests on your shoulder or in your hand.

special-quality.name: Relationship
special-quality.description: You have a relationship to another player character (Maid).

special-quality.name: Sibling
special-quality.description: You’re related by blood to one of the other characters.

special-quality.name: Childhood Friends
special-quality.description: You grew up together in the same neighborhood as one of the other characters, and have been great friends since a very early age.

special-quality.name: Mentor
special-quality.description: You look upon one of the characters as a personal mentor, perhaps even as a father/mother figure.

special-quality.name: Friendly Rival
special-quality.description: You and another character are rivals in some area of life, and you always find yourself both consciously or subconsciously competing with, and comparing yourself with, that person. However, you are still friends (at least in appearance).

special-quality.name: Ex-Lover/Love Rival
special-quality.description: You used to date another character. Perhaps there are still feelings. Alternately, you both might be seeking the love of a third person.

special-quality.name: Vengeance
special-quality.description: Another character wronged you in some way in the past. She may not even realize that she did (and it might not have seemed a big deal). But you will never forget.

special-quality.name: Criminal Tendencies
special-quality.description: You have an inclination towards criminal acts.

special-quality.name: Killer
special-quality.description: You have a bad habit: killing people.

special-quality.name: Pyromaniac
special-quality.description: You love setting fires. You might even set fire to the mansion…

special-quality.name: Kleptomaniac
special-quality.description: You can’t help but steal things, regardless of whether or not you have any use for them.

special-quality.name: Addict
special-quality.description: Whether it’s narcotics, stimulants, or just sleeping pills, you’re a substance-abuser. If you don’t get to have any, you’ll experience withdrawal symptoms.

special-quality.name: Otaku
special-quality.description: You have some obsession that you tirelessly pursue, with little or no regard for common sense.

special-quality.name: Stalker
special-quality.description: You’re stalking a particular person. Select the target from among the other PCs or the master.

special-quality.name: Injury
special-quality.description: Because of mistreatment or an accident, you have some kind of permanent physical injury.

special-quality.name: Patchwork
special-quality.description: Your body is covered with stitching scars.

special-quality.name: One Eye
special-quality.description: You have only one eye. You’re free to decide whether you wear an eye patch, and if so its design.

special-quality.name: Burns
special-quality.description: Your face, body, etc. are covered with painful-looking scars from burns.

special-quality.name: Whip Scars
special-quality.description: Your back and such is covered with painful-looking welts from whippings you received (and may possibly be still receiving?)

special-quality.name: Bandages
special-quality.description: You wear many bandages and casts, concealing injuries that will not heal.

special-quality.name: Blind
special-quality.description: You were rendered blind a long time ago. (No particular penalties for this: See the classic Zatoichi movies for reference).

special-quality.name: Tragic Love
special-quality.description: You have had sad or tragic experiences with love.

special-quality.name: Separations
special-quality.description: For some reason love just never works out for you. At this point you’ve resigned yourself to fate.

special-quality.name: Lover Died
special-quality.description: You had a lover who died since then you’ve been afraid to fall in love.

special-quality.name: Killed Your Lover
special-quality.description: For whatever reason, you killed your last lover since then you’ve been afraid to fall in love. Or afraid for the object of your desire.

special-quality.name: Former Prostitute
special-quality.description: You used to sell your body, for cheap. A complex remains.

special-quality.name: Betrayal
special-quality.description: You were once betrayed by a lover since then you’ve been afraid to fall in love or let your guard down.

special-quality.name: Stalker Damage
special-quality.description: You were once victimized by a stalker. You can’t trust members of the opposite sex… or maybe the same sex.

special-quality.name: Dark Past
special-quality.description: There is something dark in your personal history.

special-quality.name: Former Delinquent
special-quality.description: Although no one would know it looking at you now, you used to be a delinquent. Fortunately right now there’s no one (in the mansion at least) who knows about your past.

special-quality.name: Former Killer
special-quality.description: You were once a hired killer. Even now, your skills have not been dulled.

special-quality.name: Amnesiac
special-quality.description: You’ve lost your memories from when you were very young. (The GM should come up with something to reveal during the game).

special-quality.name: Bad Reputation
special-quality.description: You were involved with some bad stuff back in the day, and you have the dubious honor of being a legend for all the wrong reasons.

special-quality.name: Wanted
special-quality.description: The police want to question you about a serious crime. The player can decide whether or not the character is actually guilty.

special-quality.name: Runaway
special-quality.description: You’ve left your real home without permission.

special-quality.name: Trauma
special-quality.description: After some terrible incident, you were traumatized.

special-quality.name: Suicide Attempts
special-quality.description: In the past, you attempted suicide many times.

special-quality.name: Killed Your Parents
special-quality.description: For whatever reason, you are responsible for the death of your parents.

special-quality.name: Saw Parent Die
special-quality.description: You witnessed your parents’ (one or both) death with your own eyes.

special-quality.name: Sibling Hate
special-quality.description: You and your sister(s) detest each other.

special-quality.name: Family Breakup
special-quality.description: For some reason (economic trouble?) your family was forced to break up.You may have even caused it.

special-quality.name: Abusive Parents
special-quality.description: You were raised by abusive parents.

special-quality.name: Secret Job
special-quality.description: You’re not just a you’re secretly holding another job.

special-quality.name: Assassin
special-quality.description: While you put on the façade of being a maid, underneath you’re a coldhearted killer for hire.

special-quality.name: Hacker
special-quality.description: Aside from being a maid, you’re a hacker, breaking into computer systems.

special-quality.name: Scientist
special-quality.description: Along with being a maid, you’re some kind of mad scientist.

special-quality.name: Doctor/Pharmacist
special-quality.description: In addition to being a maid, you have the skills of a doctor or a pharmacist.

special-quality.name: Doujin Artist
special-quality.description: In addition to being a maid, you create doujinshi in your spare time. You can decide the genre.

special-quality.name: Pro Creator
special-quality.description: Along with being a maid, you’re working as a professional creator, craftsperson or artist. You can decide the form and genre of your works.

special-quality.name: Membership
special-quality.description: In addition to being a maid, you’re also a member of a certain organization.

special-quality.name: Evil Secret Society
special-quality.description: You’re a member of an evil secret society that seeks to conquer or destroy the world.

special-quality.name: Secret Agency
special-quality.description: You’re part of a secret agency under the government or the United Nations, some sort of intelligence agent or spy.

special-quality.name: Cult
special-quality.description: You’re a member of some kind of eccentric cult, whether as a believer, a leader, or even the founder.

special-quality.name: Political Organization
special-quality.description: You’re part of a group organized around some kind of political ideal, possibly something extreme to the point of insanity.

special-quality.name: Shadow Clan
special-quality.description: You’re a member of one of the secret organizations that has existed throughout history. You could be a ninja, a magician, one of the knights templar, a kung fu assassin, etc.

special-quality.name: Government Official
special-quality.description: You’re actually a government official who is working as a maid, whether because you’re a nurse, a detective going undercover, or a politician’s secretary.

special-quality.name: Shapeshifter
special-quality.description: You are an animal or weapon that has taken the form of a maid.

special-quality.name: Fox
special-quality.description: You’re actually a fox, and can display or hide your ears and tail at will.

special-quality.name: Spider
special-quality.description: You’re actually a spider, and you can become an actual human-sized spider, or else just grow up to six extra arms at will.

special-quality.name: Raven
special-quality.description: You’re actually a raven. You have black wings that can be displayed or hidden.

special-quality.name: Bunny
special-quality.description: You’re actually a bunny, with bunny ears and a tail.

special-quality.name: Tiger/Lion
special-quality.description: You’re actually a predatory cat, and you have ears, a tail, claws, and sharp teeth than you can display or hide at will.

special-quality.name: Snake
special-quality.description: You’re actually a snake, and you can take on a naga form, turning the lower half of your body into a snake tail.

special-quality.name: Monster
special-quality.description: You’re not human, but rather some kind of monster.

special-quality.name: Mermaid
special-quality.description: You’re actually a mermaid. You love water, and your ears sometimes look like fins.

special-quality.name: Zombie/Mummy
special-quality.description: You’re actually an animated corpse. Your complexion is probably bad, and you have conspicuous wounds.

special-quality.name: Werewolf
special-quality.description: You’re actually a werewolf (or maybe a weretiger). Whether or not you want to, you turn into a wolf (or tiger) during a full moon.

special-quality.name: Succubus
special-quality.description: You’re actually a succubus, a female demon that traps her prey by arousing their desires. You have some demonic physical traits (you decide the specifics) that can be displayed or hidden.

special-quality.name: Ghost
special-quality.description: You’re actually a ghost. You might have been one of the master’s ancestors, or perhaps a maid who worked at the mansion in the past.

special-quality.name: Shinigami
special-quality.description: You’re actually a shinigami, a death reaper. As such, you carry with you an aura of death. You might be there to deliver a specific person to the other side, or perhaps your reasons are more mundane.

special-quality.name: Magic
special-quality.description: You can use some kind of magical power.

special-quality.name: Priestess
special-quality.description: You can use magic grounded in some kind of religious ceremony. You must use various types of religious symbols to do so.

special-quality.name: Onmyouji
special-quality.description: You practice Eastern-style magic based on Taoist principles. Your key item for this is jufu, special curse charms written in brush ink on strips of paper.

special-quality.name: Fortuneteller
special-quality.description: Within certain limits, you have the ability to predict the future.There are countless methods of divination.

special-quality.name: Western Magician
special-quality.description: You practice alchemy, Kabbalah, or some other form of Western sorcery. As such, you are a staff-wielding orthodox magician.

special-quality.name: Devil Summoner
special-quality.description: You know the spells necessary to summon demons. Your tools of the trade are magic circles, a black cloak, and ancient books.

special-quality.name: Necromancer
special-quality.description: You wield magic that lets you control the souls and bodies of the dead. Your tools of the trade include skulls and black clothes.

special-quality.name: Absurd
special-quality.description: You’re something that flies in the face of common sense.

special-quality.name: Alien
special-quality.description: You’re an alien who came to our world from somewhere in outer space. Your body can have some special properties if you wish.

special-quality.name: Cyborg
special-quality.description: You were turned into a cyborg by an evil secret society or some other country. Your body can have some special features if you wish.

special-quality.name: Runaway Ninja
special-quality.description: You ran away from your ninja village.

special-quality.name: Magical Girl
special-quality.description: You came from a land of magic in order to train.

special-quality.name: Fairy
special-quality.description: You’re one of the fae folk. You can be a generic pixie, or something more specific.

special-quality.name: Mutant
special-quality.description: You’ve suffered some kind of strange mutation.
